channel.title: ProjectRsc - Runescape Classic Server!
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/368/bannerzzv.jpg[/img]
[b]Hello and Welcome to ProjectRSC![/b] [i][u]ProjectRsc is a Runescape Classic Private server for Skillers & Pkers![/u][/i]
Website: [url=http://www.projectrsc.com/index.php]ProjectRSC![/url] Client & Webclient: [url=http://www.projectrsc.com/downloads.php?os=windows]Download Client[/url] & [url=http://www.projectrsc.com/webclient.php]Webclient[/url] Development: [url=http://www.projectrsc.com/development.php]Update log[/url] Report Bug: [url=http://www.projectrsc.com/development.php?mode=report_bug]Report a bug[/url] Frequently Asked Questions: [url=http://www.projectrsc.com/faq.php]FAQ[/url] [i]For old players, please take look at this and see what have been changed.[/i][/center]
When we started this project our goal was to replicate RSC to the best of our ability, no discussions. As time has gone on I'm sure you will all have noticed that we have started to deviate from that original goal. Realistically it is impracticable to replicate 100% a 10 year old game. RSC was not perfect and it was not finished. There are some glaring problems/inaccuracies in RSC in the way they did things, such as, certs for only a few items, slow trading for large amounts of non-stacks, no offer x, lack of GE or better way to trade items, etc.
It is for these reasons that we feel the need to update our mission objective. Our new goals are to first replicate RSC to the best of our ability but secondly make changes where we feel the community in general will benefit.
I understand there are those of you who would prefer that we kept to the original goal of 100% replication and will undoubtedly be disappointed in our decision to stray from that objective, however I feel that this is unavoidable if we are to progress as a community, server and a game. Remember that RSC has not been properly developed in over 8 years. The game has a lot of potential and we don't want to stifle innovation because of a promise of replication.
We will at all times strive to retain that RSC feel that you all know and love.
[b]How do I play?[/b] Simply [url=http://www.projectrsc.com/register.php]register an account[/url], then proceed to our main page to [url=http://www.projectrsc.com/downloads.php?os=windows]download the client[/url]. Once you've downloaded the client, proceed to logging in using your username and password you used to sign up.
[b]What is the current XP rate?[/b] The current XP rate for both combat and stats is currently set at [b]3x[/b]. We have added a few exp boosts in the wilderness, if you enter ::skull & accept the exp boost. The current rates are [b]4x for 15+ wilderness[/b], and [b]6x for 30+ wilderness.[/b]
[b]Who currently runs ProjectRSC?[/b] Our staff are as follows as well as their positions.
[b]Rusty - Owner/Head Administrator Kilo - Community Manager/Administrator Marc - Community Manager/Administrator Lonti - Community Manager/Administrator Berg - Developer Mod Kurupt - Moderator Mod Lasme - Moderator.[/b]
You can always contact one of our [b]ACTIVE[/b] staff member.
[center][b]What ProjectRSC have:[/b] - Active pkers. - Active stakers. - Active Staff members. - Updates weekly. - War event system. - Great community. - etc. If you were a RSC player back then, this will not be like chock for you. There is no new items or exaggerated things like other servers have. [/center]
[center] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UpDGKJG5L8w[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=anDq84r-OoE[/youtube] Lvl 3 war. [img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-c-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-frc3/293863_291958434256173_290816067_n.png[/img] Drop partys. [img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-g-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/282266_289242331194450_1740423428_n.png[/img] [img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-g-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-prn1/76673_291958954256121_1459427821_n.png[/img] [/center]
[center][i]I have posted this under permission from owner. [/i][/center]

How are you going to go about informing all players that we are back online? Do you have access to twitter/facebook/everyones registered email address?

Glad that someone has taken this on, would have been a shame to see the sever go under.[/quote]

item.title: ProjectRsc - Runescape Classic Server!
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

[quote=“All Day, post:69, topic:509360”]Sorry for the delay.

The company that I am using for hosting was working out a few kinks they were having with their new network.

Most of the files are transferred to the new dedicated server. Currently I am making sure there are no absolute game-breaking bugs and then the server will be live![/quote]

So your running the show now eh?

Read full topic

item.title: ProjectRsc - Runescape Classic Server!
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

[quote=“tigerclan, post:65, topic:509360”][quote author=JUMPHIM link=topic=627608.msg4280572#msg4280572 date=1365486632]

The server will be brought up by me in two days time. I have access to all the old server files including a fairly recent copy of the database 22/03/2013.

Sorry for the troubles.
[/quote][quote author=All Day link=topic=627608.msg4280398#msg4280398 date=1365458565]
The server will be brought up by me in two days time. I have access to all the old server files including a fairly recent copy of the database 22/03/2013.

Sorry for the troubles.

Who are you? o.o

He’s Bateman, ex-mod on PRSC

tiger bad idea telling who is in game name is now most people wont bother thinking he will play favorite.

all day that’s good to hear can you shed some light on the reason why rusty quit? and will berg still be developing?

also will the server go back in the direction it was meant to go ?
[/quote]

I don’t understand? It’s not like it’s a secret to begin with, and personally I wouldn’t want to play on a server funded by someone hiding their most commonly known name. And to clarify for everyone, the “ex-mod” wasn’t saying that he was a bad mod or anything anyways. Rusty de-modded all the mods when he took over.[/quote]
i said that all wrong sorry. what i meant was most people dont like the man crew and if they know there running the server not many will play, i personally wont mind as long as they keep the same mods that are there now,.

Read full topic
